name: David
description: Shepherd boy who became greatest king. Giant-slayer, psalmist, warrior-poet. Flawed but beloved, a man after God's heart.

slinging-stone.name: Slinging at Goliath
slinging-stone.description: Sling whirling, about to release the stone
slinging-stone.prompt: young shepherd with sling whirling overhead - about to release stone, intense focus, no armor just simple tunic, facing unseen giant with complete confidence, the moment before victory

playing-harp.name: Playing the Harp
playing-harp.description: Young David playing harp, soothing Saul's spirit
playing-harp.prompt: seated playing lyre/harp - fingers on strings, peaceful expression, the musician who soothed a tormented king, shepherd-poet creating psalms

dancing-before-ark.name: Dancing Before the Ark
dancing-before-ark.description: Leaping and dancing as Ark enters Jerusalem
dancing-before-ark.prompt: leaping in ecstatic dance - ephod swirling, arms raised, face showing pure joy, dancing with all his might before the Lord, king becoming worshipper

crowned-king.name: Crowned King
crowned-king.description: David anointed/crowned as King of Israel
crowned-king.prompt: standing as crown placed on head - royal robes, expression of humble acceptance, the shepherd boy finally king over united Israel, promise fulfilled

leading-mighty-men.name: Leading the Mighty Men
leading-mighty-men.prompt: standing among elite warriors - sword drawn, surrounded by loyal mighty men, battle-ready, the warrior-king who inspired legendary loyalty

repentant-prayer.name: Repentant Prayer
repentant-prayer.description: On knees after Nathan confronts him
repentant-prayer.prompt: kneeling in repentant prayer - head bowed, perhaps tears, broken before God after sin exposed, the flawed king seeking forgiveness, Psalm 51 moment
